title: Welcome to the Library
paragraph: Fall semester is underway and the library is here to help with all your research needs. And we have novels, DVDs, and board games!

image-alt: tools on wall by Barn Images
title: Grad Student Essentials
paragraph: Add skills to your research tool belt! Join us for workshops this fall.

title: Chat help is available 24/7!
paragraph: Don't know where to start on that assignment? Get research help from a librarian 24 hours a day via chat!

image-alt: room with tables and archival materials
title: Spec Reading Room
paragraph: The Special Collections Reading Room has new hours! Visit us to explore our archival materials.

title: What Does Your Library Look Like?
paragraph: Explore our new My Library stories highlighting students and little-known library services.
